jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Support Country Procurement Head through value creation of cost reduction and cost avoidance initiatives project (Procurement Initiatives Pipeline)
  • Execute Procurement Initiative Pipeline pertaining to managed Spend Category, align with Procurement Procedure
  • Lead all vendor Selection Process (Tactical & Strategic bidding), to support business target
  • Maintain relationship with country vendors, to support Go-Jek’s positioning in the market
  • Support country procurement to build country’s price catalog (contracted) and strategized country spend and avoid repetitive vendor selection process
  • Achieve provided annual saving target, both Cost Avoidance and Cost Reduction
  • Support Global Procurement initiative relevant to country spend led by Global Category Manager
  • Preparing procurement documentation for each sourcing activities
  • Become the ambassador of Procurement value creation process and build relationship with
  • Businesses to ensure “Early Procurement Involvement

• Minimum Bachelor Degree (IT background is favorable)
  • Minimum 5 years procurement experience
  • Marketing activity exposures are an added value
